#summary Golf Markup Language Reference: simpleType Rating.
#sidebar TOCSchema

== Name ==

[SRating Rating]
===  Super Types ===
{{{
float
  |
  +--Rating (restriction)
}}}
    
----
  	
===  Documentation ===

        
			The rating type defines a standard, generic, evaluation criteria for golfml entities.
			Rating is limited to 0 to 5 "stars". Decimal faction allowed.
		
----
      
  	
===  Properties ===

  	This component is not nillable.
----
  	
===  Model ===

	
{{{
        [0-5]{0,1}(\.[0-9]{1,1})?
}}}
      
    inclusive upper bound: 5
